title: One Stop GeoLocation Solution
text: Easy-Geo is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a coding level, plus customized intensive tools for premium users.

section.title: Why Easy-Geo?
section.content: Easy-Geo is an APIs based web app that has a lot of easy-to-use tools for converting addresses to geolocations.

section.title: Why premium?
section.content: Premium plan gives you total controls over geo data process and management.
